title: Accessibility for developers - ARIA and the Accessibility Tree
description: An introduction to the key aspects of web accessibility and inclusive design, relevant to web developers. Our training helps your team deliver accessible and inclusive products and services first time, every time, by embedding best practice in your processes and offering valuable insights to every member of your teams.
topics: Overview of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines
What is ARIA and how to use it
Name, Role, Value and how to apply it
other_accessibility_support: A captioned recording with transcript will be shared with attendees after the live event
cost: Free or reduced fee for some
